程序包 edu.monash.fit2099.engine

类 DoNothingAction

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.DoNothingAction
public class DoNothingAction
extends Action
An Action that doesn't do anything. Use this to implement waiting or similar actions in game clients.

  • 方法详细资料

    • execute

      public java.lang.String execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      从类复制的说明: Action
      Perform the Action.
      指定者:
      execute 在类中 Action
      参数:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      map - The map the actor is on.
      返回:
      a description of what happened that can be displayed to the user.

    • menuDescription

      public java.lang.String menuDescription​(Actor actor)
      从类复制的说明: Action
      Returns a descriptive string
      指定者:
      menuDescription 在类中 Action
      参数:
      actor - The actor performing the action.
      返回:
      the text we put on the menu

    • hotkey

      public java.lang.String hotkey()
      从类复制的说明: Action
      Returns the key used in the menu to trigger this Action. There's no central management system for this, so you need to be careful not to use the same one twice. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Connascence
      覆盖:
      hotkey 在类中 Action
      返回:
      The key we use for this Action in the menu, or null to have it assigned for you.
